Identifier

Source: R/Id.R
new_id.Rd

Generate a new unique identifier.

new_id()

Value

Id object.

Details

Identifiers are made using the uuid::UUIDgenerate().

See also

uuid::UUIDgenerate().

Examples

# create new id
i <- new_id()

# print id
print(i)
#> id: 565c7e11-e490-463b-af10-34b35d3b0ffb

# convert to character
as.character(i)
#> [1] "565c7e11-e490-463b-af10-34b35d3b0ffb"

# check if it is an Id object
is.Id(i)
#> [1] TRUE
